title: ISic000404. Sarcophagus of Adelphia
body:
1ic Adelfia c(larissima) f(emina)
2posita conpar
3Baleri comitis

l.1 reg., orig.

1ICADELFIACF
2POSITACONPAR
3BALERICOMITIS

l.1 reg., orig.

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Line.1: IC with no space for initial H

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Here is laid to rest Adelphia, lady of senatorial rank, wife of the Count Valerius

Italian translation

Qui è deposta Adelfia clarissima femina moglie del conte Valerio

commentary
